Notes:
yep am still around if something needs to be fixed, and this one needed lots of work
Cam quality was damned perfect technically
first mins of the minion intro was oos from 12 up to 45 seconds since they were merged with different framerates,
5mins in theire was a 2minute video looping, wtf
both videos suffered from different interlace problems.
video was skewed

Encode:
fixed perspective
downsized to 720p -  looks waybetter and more crisp
removed the interlaced frames from both videos
removed the video looping
fixed framerate for the intro video
fixed brightness,contrast,rgb relation,added sharpness
resynced audio
cleaned audio
removed cinavia

Quality is tested and optimized to look perfect on a 75" 4K TV.

got very nice and will do me till retail
enjoy
